modal.duration_fail: Failed to get the duration of the recording!

modal_content.duration_fail: Failed to get the duration of the recording!
modal_content.ennuizel: Buttons that have a red border require audio processing in your browser using Ennuizel. Depending on your browser, it may be unsupported or take up a good amount of RAM to process your recording. If you have any problems, choose a different format.
modal_content.ennuizel_mobile: It seems like you are on a mobile device! It's HIGHLY recommended to do this on a PC. Don't complain to us if you run into problems!
modal_content.delete_rec: Are you sure you want to delete this recording? This action is IRREVERSABLE and nobody can help you get it back.

format_desc.mov: MOV supports transparency and is widely supported by video editors, but is far too large to generate and send directly. Instead, you will be sent compressed files and an extractor. MOV may contain QuickTime Animation or PNG; some video editors support one or the other, and some support both, but they are functionally equivalent.
format_desc.mkvh264: MPEG-4 does not support transparency, so both a static PNG image and an MKV representing the alpha (transparency) channel will be sent. Most video editors can be instructed to use one file for color and another file for alpha (transparency).
format_desc.webmvp8: WebM supports transparency, but most video editors do not support WebM.

error.1006: This recording is already being processed! Please try again later.
error.1007: This recording does not have the MP3 feature enabled.
error.1008: This recording does not have the glowers feature enabled.
error.1009: This recording does not have the smart mix feature enabled.
error.1010: The PNG format cannot a different container other than ZIP.
error.2001: You are sending too many requests. Please try again later.
